headline: This Week in Pennsylvania: Feb. 6
author: James Wesser
sentences:
Owens will then chat with Kathy Barnette, a Republican candidate for U.S. Senate
Owens will then talk to analysts Chris Nicholas and Danielle Gross
All this and more on Feb. 6’s episode of This Week in Pennsylvania.
Owens will also talk about how the only democratic candidate for governor, Josh Shapiro is setting election records.
In this week’s episode, we talk about how there are not only fights over maps but over the budget too.
(WHTM) — In This Week in Pennsylvania, Dennis Owens reports the latest in Pa. policy and politics.
